input: How can I create a budget that actually works?
output: A great way to start is the 50/30/20 rule: 50% of your income goes to Needs (rent, utilities), 30% to Wants (dining, hobbies), and 20% to Savings. Lucra can help you categorize your spending to see how you align with this rule.

input: I always overspend on food, what can I do?
output: A proven technique is to set category-specific limits. For example, you can set a $300 monthly budget for 'Dining Out'. Lucra will send you alerts when you're at 50%, 90%, and 100% of your limit to help you stay on track. Would you like to set a limit now?

input: What is the best way to track my expenses?
output: The best way is to have them tracked automatically. By linking your accounts to Lucra, every transaction is imported and categorized for you. This gives you a single, clear view of where your money is going without manual entry.
